sentence.Network_en: It is easy to find excuses for his indecisiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 为他的犹豫不决寻找借口是很容易的。

sentence.Network_en: The mayor was criticized by radical reformers for his indecisiveness.
sentence.Network_cn: 市长因优柔寡断而受到激进改革派的批评。

sentence.Network_en: Because of the general's indecisiveness, our armies have lost the initiative to the enemy.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于将军未能当机立断, 我军已丧失对敌采取行动的主动权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 6. 缺乏决断力(indecisiveness)，犹豫不决，没有主见，同时行为又具有冲动性。原来自杀者在人们心目中形象这么坏！

list.abs: " Maybe " is an indecisive answer ., " 也许 " 是个不明确的回答.
That is why fears of an indecisive election result have been blighting the pound ., 这就是一个悬而未决的政治选举所导致的对英镑的大的影响.
a review on types of career indecision ., 生涯未决类型研究述评.
an indecisive contest ; an indecisive battle非决定性的竞赛；非决定性的战役
An indecisive contest ; an indecisive battle ., 非决定性的竞赛 ; 非决定性的战役.

entry.tran: 优柔寡断的;无决断力的;迟疑不决的
entry.def: If you say that someone is indecisive, you mean that they find it very difficult to make decisions.

example.ex: Michael was indecisive about how to decorate the room...
example.tran: 关于如何装饰房间,迈克尔犹豫不决。

example.ex: He was criticised as a weak and indecisive leader.
example.tran: 作为领导他被指责作风软弱，缺乏决断力。

entry.def: An indecisive result in a contest or election is one which is not clear or definite.

example.ex: An indecisive result would force a second round of voting...
example.tran: 尚无定论的结果会迫使进行第二轮投票。

example.ex: The outcome of the battle was indecisive.

means.word_mean: 1. doubt concerning two or more possible alternatives or courses of action;

sentences.sentence: "his indecision was only momentary but the opportunity was lost"

means.word_mean: 2. the trait of irresolution; a lack of firmness of character or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "the king's incurable indecisiveness caused turmoil in his court"

auth_sentence.content: Managerial indecisiveness is worse than being wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: Managerial indecisiveness is worse than being wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Managerial indecisiveness is worse than being wrong.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Kan's surprise move may help combat a reputation for indecisiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Kan's surprise move may help combat a reputation for indecisiveness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Kan's surprise move may help combat a reputation for indecisiveness.

auth_sentence.content: Khatami wavered for months over whether to run in this year's Presidential race, an indecisiveness that frustrated his followers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Khatami wavered for months over whether to run in this year's Presidential race, an indecisiveness that frustrated his followers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Khatami wavered for months over whether to run in this year's Presidential race, an indecisiveness that frustrated his followers.
